comment._content: Charlotte Harriet Jane Lockhart, daughter of Sophia Scott and John Gibson Lockhart, wife of James Robert Hope (m. 1847). Her husband changed the family name to Hope-Scott in recognition of her famous maternal ancestor. James Robert Hope-Scott's memoirs are on Googlebooks; Chapter XXIII covers the years from their marriage to her death in 1858, along with the deaths of her two youngest children in the weeks following. She was about 31. She was buried with little Margaret and Walter in a vault at St. Margaret's convent, Edinburgh. books.google.com/books?id=YzNKAAAAMAAJ
